mapper.select: select * from inquiry_category order by id;
select * from occupation_category order by id;
mapper.insert: insert into inquiry (user_name, furigana, dental_hospital_name, occupation_category_id, mail_address, zip_code, address, tel, fax, inquiry_category_id, contents) values (#{userName}, #{furigana}, #{dentalHospitalName}, #{occupationCategoryId}, #{mailAddress}, #{zipCode}, #{address}, #{tel}, #{fax}, #{inquiryCategoryId}, #{contents});
